snippet: Bruno Mars’s new album, “Unorthodox Jukebox,” emphasizes a particular style or influence on each of its 10 tracks, offering energy-infused but profoundly cosseted songs.
abstract: Jon Caramanica observes that singer-songwriter Bruno Mars’s latest album, Unorthodox Jukebox, emphasizes a particular style or influence on each of its 10 tracks, offering energy-infused but profoundly cosseted songs.
lead_paragraph: Bruno Mars’s new album, “Unorthodox Jukebox,” emphasizes a particular style or influence on each of its 10 tracks, offering energy-infused but profoundly cosseted songs.
